content: I only learned of BJ's death on April 9th. I am hearbroken by his death. I have been unable to find out where he was buried so I could send flowers. The papers got his age wrong. He was 47, not 46 and he was a SSgt (E-5) when he was accepted to OTS. My prayers are for peace for his current family and for those who respected him. Could anyone please tell me where he is buried so I can send flowers? Thank you.
reply: I only learned of BJ's death on April 9th. I am hearbroken by his death. I have been unable to find out where he was buried so I could send flowers. The papers got his age wrong. He was 47, not 46 and he was a SSgt (E-5) when he was accepted to OTS. My prayers are for peace for his current family and for those who respected him. Could anyone please tell me where he is buried so I can send flowers? Thank you.
title: Edwards AFB Chief Dies After Exercising

content: quote: Originally posted by VCP63: otisotis Does your computer link to other sites besides www.military.com The reason I am asking is that I have not seen any original ideas from you and thought you might be working for military.com. Well, if you had read the rules of the site, you'd know that for copy write reasons, we can no longer post hot links, other than Mil.com or governmental public web sites... We can post "non" hot linked sites by putting quotation marks before and after the address... Respectfully, SUNLINER81
